artist: Painter: Francis Hayman; Engraver: Charles Grignion
description: Sampson seated on a stone bench with chains on ankles and with a pole in his hand; Delila richly dressed seated beside him; 3 men at left, a woman behind and a boy standing at left; in a landscape
inscription:
Signature, title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [F. Hayman inv: et del.   C. Grignion sculp/ Sampson Agonistes]; on sheet in pencil: [1-525]
title: Sampson Agonistes
